snippet: Health experts fear that government officials are not acknowledging the scope of a problem that threatens hundreds of millions of people, not just in India but around the world.
abstract: India has become focal point in epidemic of dengue fever that is sweeping globe, as incidence of mosquito-borne tropical disease rapidly rises there; Indian officials have been reluctant to confront disease's spread, causing worry that they may be impeding efforts to contain it.
lead_paragraph: Health experts fear that government officials are not acknowledging the scope of a problem that threatens hundreds of millions of people, not just in India but around the world.

headline.seo: Alarm Over India’s Dengue Fever Epidemic
headline.main: As Dengue Fever Sweeps India, a Slow Response Stirs Experts’ Fears
headline.print_headline: As Dengue Fever Sweeps India, a Lackluster Response Stirs Experts’ Fears
